description:
Rito, Mari, and Kotoko decide to destroy the Amatsumara. The relief of their bodies returning to normal doesn`t last long--the furious Ebifurya attempts to capture the girls himself. However, Misa stands in his way in an attempt to stop him. When Misa describes her admiration and feelings towards creativity, the girls are deeply sympathetic. And then she reveals a shocking truth.
Source: crunchyroll
